description.originalText:
Thiny was our full time nanny for my son roughly between the age of 8 months and 2 years old. She was a fantastic nanny who will still use today as a baby sitter. 

Thiny was always on time and communicated well with us. 

Thiny spoke Spanish to my son which helped him prepare for his bilingual preschool. 

We highly recommend Thiny and have referred her to other families in the Cranford/Westfield area.

description.displayText: Thiny was actually very nice..I only needed her for 3 days for 30mins ONLY but paid her for the full week..I used her for 3 days before school started so my children can get used to her, even told her she can bring her own kids if needed (which she told me were teenagers but she only bought her daughter once) however school started and she quit the morning she was supposed to start, I asked if I could keep her on stand by and never got a response back at all which put me in a horrible bind where I even had to quit my job
